name: Shohoz Health
description: Shohoz, the leading super app of the country, launched ‘Shohoz Health’ the most comprehensive digital health solution with 100+ specialized doctors during pandemic 2020. This state-of-the-art digital healthcare app allow users to access specialized doctors through video-based consultation from anywhere in Bangladesh. Besides, it does also allow users to receive prescription as well as medicine delivery from over 100 pharmacies – all under the Shohoz Super App.
